Send & Carry Packages Smarter with Bagmails
Send parcels faster with real travelers. , Earn money by carrying items on your trip. , Ship smart and save more. , Turn your travel into extra income. , Connect. Travel. Deliver. , The smarter way to ship items. , Crowdshipping made simple. , Where senders meet travelers.

What Bagmails Works?

Bagmails connects senders and travelers for efficient, affordable, and personalized deliveries—helping both save time and money.

Post Your Request

Whether you're sending a package or traveling with space to spare, create a listing with details like destination, size, and reward.

Browse & Accept

Travelers on your route or senders needing a delivery can choose your listing and get in touch to confirm the details.

Confirm & Deliver

Once both parties confirm, the package is delivered directly, and the traveler or sender receives their reward.

How We Do It?

We make your spending stress free for you to have the perfect control.

01

Create Listings

Post your delivery request with the package details, destination, preferred delivery date, and reward. Your listing is instantly visible to travelers going that way.

02

Accept the Offer

Travelers heading in the same direction browse listings and choose the ones they can carry. Once they accept your offer, you're notified instantly.

03

Contact and Pickup

You and the traveler connect directly through the platform to coordinate pickup details — choose a convenient time and place that works for both of you.

04

Ddelivery

The traveler delivers the package safely and in person. Once confirmed by the recipient, the traveler receives the reward — completing the delivery loop.

Smarter. Faster. Greener. Bagmails transforms how you send and earn.

Whether you're shipping a package or traveling the world, Bagmails helps you save money, make money, and move smarter.

How We Do It?

For Travelers – How Bagmails Turns Every Trip Into Extra Earnings

Turn Every Trip Into an Earning Opportunity

You're already traveling — why not earn extra cash for simply carrying a small package?

No Detours, No Delays

Deliver items that match your existing travel route. No extra stops, just smooth earning.

Flexible & Hassle-Free

Choose deliveries that fit your schedule. You're always in control of what you accept.

Build Trust & Reputation

Earn good reviews, build your profile, and become a top-choice carrier for future senders.

For Senders – Why Bagmails is Your Smartest Shipping Option

Faster Than Couriers

No more waiting days for deliveries — get your package delivered in hours by a traveler en route.

Affordable & Transparent

Set your own reward. No hidden fees. Pay only for the value of real human help.

Send Anywhere, Anytime

Reach destinations traditional services can’t — even small towns, remote places, or urgent locations.

Real People, Real Communication

Talk directly with the traveler to arrange details, clarify expectations, and stay informed.
